summary.description:
Today, cooler for the outside temperature (down 2.4°C) and feels like temperature (down 2.3°C) and more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 12%).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 8924 lux) and cloud levels (up 385 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in the amount of wind (up 20 miles), light levels (up 8133 lux), and cloud levels (up 200 m) when compared to today.

Yesterday, cloud levels hit a low of 412m and a high of 1807m, averaging 668.3m; the past week and month reported somewhat higher averages.

summary.summary: Inside; temperatures should be quite comfortable. Outside; the temperature will feel nicely warm and pleasant. Also, air will feel comfortable and balanced and gentle light winds are expected. Possible light showers, cloud cover will be variable, overcast at times, and some sunny spells will occur. Weather patterns to stay the same.
